about_the_game:
Take a journey behind the scenes of 3 Minutes to Midnight with The Art of 3 Minutes to Midnight!

Packed with captivating concept art, original sketches, and unused materials, this 176-page art book reveals the artistic evolution of the game. Inside, you'll find:

⭐ Early character concepts showcasing the evolution of the game's protagonists.

⭐ First sketches for environments, capturing the early stages of the world-building process as the team sought to define the game's unique style.

⭐ Images of game items, including those discarded due to changes or puzzle removals.

⭐ Cutscene sketches and images, offering a behind-the-scenes look at the cinematic elements.

⭐ A map of the game world, detailing key locations.

⭐ Other assets such as posters, banners, and additional creative materials crafted during development.

⭐ Unpublished content along with notes and comments from the creator, providing an inside look at the development process.

Available in PDF format, this art book is a must-have for fans and anyone interested in the artistry that brings 3 Minutes to Midnight to life.
